column4: Still having problems with my realtek driver --> anyone had problems with the r8169/8168
If I blacklist a driver in the /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist.config ..should it still show up when I do the lspci -v?
I followed this (http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1022411) 80% as I had problems with the last 2 commands.
Check to see if the card is blacklisted => as well, try running "sudo jockey-gtk" and see if a driver is available.
